org.cougaar.mts.base
Interface AspectSupport

All Superinterfaces:
Service
public interface AspectSupport
extends Service

This is an MTS-internal utility service which supports the use of aspects. It's used to add new aspects, typically at load time, and to attach aspect delegates at run time.

Method Detail

findAspect

MessageTransportAspect findAspect(java.lang.String classname)
Return an aspect object whose class is as given. If there's more than one, returns the last one added. If there are none, return null.

findAspect

<T> T findAspect(java.lang.Class<T> aspectClass)

addAspect

void addAspect(MessageTransportAspect aspect)
Add an aspect to the global list.

addAspect

void addAspect(StandardAspect aspect)
Add an aspect to the global list. This method is vestigial, since StandardAspects are also MessageTransportAspects.

attachAspects

<T> T attachAspects(T object,
                    java.lang.Class<T> type)
Allow each global aspect to attach a delegate to given object at the cut-point indicated by the given type. The generic parameter T enforces that the object provided matches the type provided.

attachAspects

<T> T attachAspects(T delegate,
                    java.lang.Class<T> type,
                    java.util.List<java.lang.String> candidates)
Allow each aspect in the list of candidates to attach a delegate to given object at the cut-point indicated by the given type.
